mean_cn: n. 锣，钟状物，奖章；  v. 鸣锣，鸣锣命令驾车者
mean_en: a large metal disc that makes a deep ringing sound when it is struck with a padded hammer
short_phrase: make a loud noise with the gong
sentence: If hitting this gong doesn't wake him up, I'm going to have to hit HIM!
sentence_trans: 如果敲这个锣还不能吵醒他，我就要打他了。
